Key Match Events: De'Aaron Fox scored 33 points, 6 assists, 6 rebounds, 1 steal, and 1 turnover. Domantas Sabonis had 17 points, 16 rebounds, 7 assists, and 1 steal.
Pre-Game Insights: The Mavericks were missing Kyrie Irving, Luka Doncic, Klay Thompson, Naji Marshall, Derrick Lively, and Dante Exum.
Post-Match Reflections: Doug Christie got props for his coaching decisions.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Kings trailed by as many as 18 points in the first half but came back to win.
Others: The Kings will host the Philadelphia 76ers on New Years Day.
